channel.title: Fuzion PKz (317) Delta first release ever
channel.description:
[center][center]hello guys, this is my first release i hope you like it.
name: Fuzion-pkz v1 Base: Delta
features:
- anti syi ( 2 connection per ip)
- anti dupe
- Donator crown
- all godswords hit good
- c'bow hits good
- fixed sara brews glitch
- fixed Login death glitch
- fixed d scim glitch
- d bow special is removed, because of the glitchers (you can add back if you want)
- clanchat interface
- item kept on death interface
- added accurate eventmanager (thanks to Graham)
- like 90% Dueling and Staking ( can be glitchy) (you can stake amounts but dont use "all" otherwise Dc)
- and more ofcourse
lets just start..[/center]
Pictures: (around 34)
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2gwweid.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/n64yf8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2gvvtck.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/15npyee.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/25iyxc2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/1108v4k.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2drc4s8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2j32xcj.jpg[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2m42lj4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2n9ghw8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/n3b0w8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/f0auys.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/23t1px4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/whm7g2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/259e5jm.jpg[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2pydfyo.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ilahp4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/i5vx8z.jpg[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/1z1clcy.jpg[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2r47le0.jpg[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/308egdl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2e4av4k.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ce0wet.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2hgwk6b.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/x4i5jq.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ilbqee.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2rnybnb.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/29ndndd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/4gl8y.jpg[/img]
pff that was a long end but thats all.
Credits: (server)
- Delta 50% - Me 40% - Tuts 10%
credits (client)
- Bluur 80% - Me 20%
Client link:
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?4eyzi2mnbf1
Server link:
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?yd2jhzyytjw
Please leave a comment!

item.title: Fuzion PKz (317) Delta first release ever
item.dc:creator: @TheImpureOne TheImpureOne
item.description:
@TheImpureOne wrote:

There isn’t much different between this and Deltascape/dds speced. TBH, dds speced had pretty much all of this stuff(atleast for all I’ve heard) so pretty much all you did was some little edits here and there, nothing that special…But, I guess for a first release I understand. In your next one try adding like a new custom mini-game or maybe change something in the client and make it work with the server. Something that is very unique about your server.

Read full topic
